blog.name: bluelightenterprises
blog.title: Zootopia Soup
blog.description:
Sitting here across the bay from San Francisco. I can see Mt. Tamalpais from my front yard. Trying to avoid being too obsessive in my search for excellence in Zootopia art. The header image is from the brilliant RareWhoRoastBeast on Deviant Art

My over 18 NSFW blog is here:  https://foxandbunnynaughtybits.tumblr.com/

title: Iron Man - Trailer [HD]
excerpt: Paramount Pictures and Marvel Studios' big screen adaptation of Marvel's legendary Super Hero Iron Man will launch into theaters on May 2, 2008. Oscar nomine...
description:
Fascinating that Iron Man is a substantially stronger emotional trip with more touching emotional beats in rewatch for MCU fans than prior to Avengers: Endgame:

The clanging of his hammer while building his first suit in the cave that we heard again at the end of Endgame.

Pepper Pott’s gift to him of his first chest piece on which is written: “Proof that Tony Stark has a heart” which is set out onto the lake by his house on a wreath after his death.

His moment of resolve when taking to heart the final words of the doctor who saved his life to not “waste his life” feels even heavier when knowing where this change in his journey will finally take him.

And of course when he asks for a cheeseburger.

So cool to see Robert Downey Jr. set the tone for most of the rest of the MCU films in this first of 22.

And Iron Man is one of the strongest, most rewatchable Marvel universe movies.

summary: I’m rewatching the first iron man and just burst into tears when tony came back from Afghanistan and reunited with...
body:
I’m rewatching the first iron man and just burst into tears when tony came back from Afghanistan and reunited with Pepper

Cheeseburgers first will always be my favorite words to live by

summary:
“If this was your last birthday party, who do you want to celebrate with”
“I’d do whatever I want to do, with whoever I want to...
body:
“If this was your last birthday party, who do you want to celebrate with”

“I’d do whatever I want to do, with whoever I want to do with”

Okay biggest question is did Natasha ever get to spend any of her birthday doing whatever she wanted to do since 2012 after she found her family

blog.name: thelastdragon6
blog.title: Starkwalker
blog.description:
HERE TO HAVE A GOOD TIME

<a href=“https://thelastdragon6.tumblr.com/post/183831557809/master-list”>Masterlist.</a>

body:
Found legacy ch.4

A/N- :)

Warning- SPOILERS!! Language

—-

Space was a beautiful and big thing something I would enjoy if I wasn’t worried trying to look for my dad and peter. But still sometimes I couldn’t help but stare at the stars so many of them. All much clearer and more beautiful then in earth. It all reminded me when I was in hydra those nights I would look up the little window I had hoping and knowing that their was much more then that little space. Seeing the stars always gave me hope back there. Hope that I would leave that place and travel the world see the stars from different places In the world. And now I was in fucking space unbelievable!

Harry would love this.

Our spaceship was destroyed a couple days after being in space by some people that hated Carol. The good thing is I had the suit. We had also gathered some information on where tony and peter could’ve been. When we arrived on the said planet there was nothing there but pure emptiness. Looked like it had been abanonded for years. The only clue we had was a what looked like a moon had crashed into the planet and another broke spaceship Nothing else and nothing more.

I was more fustarted then before. We’ve been in space for five days and still nothing. We had no spaceship anymore and the clue we had to finding them was a dead clue now. I kicked a rock that was on the ground and it went flying across. My helmet retracts from my face revealing frustrated tears.

Frustrated because you couldn’t find the only dad you had. The dad you just got to meet even if it felt like a long time it really wasn’t. It has just been 2 to 3 years with him. You’ve only recently got know him after years of not knowing if you had a family and if you did them not caring. I hated to think the fact that he was gone but maybe Steve was right maybe he was gone and I’m out here in a space adventure rather then looking for the stones.

I again felt the loss of control I was frustrated but I tried to call myself tried to be my own anchor just like carol had said to do. I ran my fingers through my hair in a huff. I heard Carol approach but I said nothing instead looked down at the red dirt. She put her hand on my shoulder and squeezed it trying to comfort me.

“We’re going to find him okay? There still might be a chance for him to be stuck not far by.” She reassured me. Her words felt distant they felt like lies now. Just her trying to keep me calm and to keep me from killing myself with my own powers. I wanted to give up, give up hope but deep inside me I knew that if I was lost in space and never made it back then he would do everything could to find me again. I cling onto that last bit of hope I had inside me and pushed myself up. I put my helmet back on and turned to look at Carol.

“Lets go.” I told her she smiled and we blasted off.

I don’t know why but the hope I had was decreasing with every passing minute when not seeing any sign of anything but just darkness and the emptiness of space. we traveled for what felt like forever passing by the same background we had passed everyday. It all looked the same until we saw a shape of what looked to be a ship it was to dark to tell. We got closer with Carol lighting the way. The ship didn’t seem to be on or anything just looked to be stranded. We moved to the front of the ship to see if would find anyone or anything inside.

Their was hope building up once more when I saw the ship. I couldn’t hide it as hard as I tried I couldn’t. When we got to the front of the ship Carol pushed me to be behind her just in case if any sudden attack would happen. I looked inside and their was a body inside and it seemed to be moving but in a non threatening way. I moved myself to be in front now so I could get a better view. My eyes went wide at the sight of him and I felt a smile grow behind my helmet. I felt joy as I saw him. All I wanted to do was rush in hug him but I couldn’t not until we landed back on earth. When I saw him he was blocking his eyes from the brightness that came from Carol. I could still see his eyes as they peaked over his arm. I saw his eyes shift over to me a confused gaze not knowing who was under the helmet. The sight of him brought me joy but it also made me sad seeing as cheeks were hallow and his skin looked pale. In the background I saw another figure approach the front of the ship from inside. Carol looked over at me with a knowing smile on her face.

“Time to go home.”

—

When we landed back on earth I saw Steve, Natasha, Bruce, Rhodey, Rocket, Harry and Pepper on the ground waiting and seeing as we landed on the ground close to them. Steve rushed over to the ship and the door opened revealing Tony. He looked over at me still wondering who was behind the helmet. I quickly got out of the suit finally revealing myself. A wide and relieved smile on my face when I saw him standing there with Steve. When he saw me he looked relieved and a small smile appeared on his face. I rushed over to him and gave him a hug. He wrapped his arms around me and his hand run down my hair as he kissed the top of my head.

“Oh god you’re here, you’re alive.” I heard him say quietly with a relieved sigh. I felt as happy tears now rolled down my cheeks. I tried to be gentle and not hug him that tight afraid to break his fragile state. “I lost him…. I lost peter.” He whispered his voice breaking. I closed my eyes at the sound of that and swallowed thickly. Seconds later feeling the embrace of Pepper as she came to hug tony. I was going to move to the side but she pulled me closer. Tony now had his arms wrapped around the both of us. This made me feel better made me feel complete. Having them both here with me.

Maybe theirs still hope to bring peter back. We just find the stones and we can maybe bring them all back. We have to have hope even if it is just a little. We need to bring him back all of them back.

.

.

.

.

I again felt the loss of control I was frustrated but I tried to call myself tried to be my own anchor just like carol had said to do. I ran my fingers through my hair in a huff. I heard Carol approach but I said nothing instead looked down at the red dirt. She put her hand on my shoulder and squeezed it trying to comfort me.

“We’re going to find him okay? There still might be a chance for him to be stuck not far by.” She reassured me. Her words felt distant they felt like lies now. Just her trying to keep me calm and to keep me from killing myself with my own powers. I wanted to give up, give up hope but deep inside me I knew that if I was lost in space and never made it back then he would do everything could to find me again. I cling onto that last bit of hope I had inside me and pushed myself up. I put my helmet back on and turned to look at Carol.

“Lets go.” I told her she smiled and we blasted off.

I don’t know why but the hope I had was decreasing with every passing minute when not seeing any sign of anything but just darkness and the emptiness of space. we traveled for what felt like forever passing by the same background we had passed everyday. It all looked the same until we saw a shape of what looked to be a ship it was to dark to tell. We got closer with Carol lighting the way. The ship didn’t seem to be on or anything just looked to be stranded. We moved to the front of the ship to see if would find anyone or anything inside.

Their was hope building up once more when I saw the ship. I couldn’t hide it as hard as I tried I couldn’t. When we got to the front of the ship Carol pushed me to be behind her just in case if any sudden attack would happen. I looked inside and their was a body inside and it seemed to be moving but in a non threatening way. I moved myself to be in front now so I could get a better view. My eyes went wide at the sight of him and I felt a smile grow behind my helmet. I felt joy as I saw him. All I wanted to do was rush in hug him but I couldn’t not until we landed back on earth. When I saw him he was blocking his eyes from the brightness that came from Carol. I could still see his eyes as they peaked over his arm. I saw his eyes shift over to me a confused gaze not knowing who was under the helmet. The sight of him brought me joy but it also made me sad seeing as cheeks were hallow and his skin looked pale. In the background I saw another figure approach the front of the ship from inside. Carol looked over at me with a knowing smile on her face.

“Time to go home.”

—

When we landed back on earth I saw Steve, Natasha, Bruce, Rhodey, Rocket, Harry and Pepper on the ground waiting and seeing as we landed on the ground close to them. Steve rushed over to the ship and the door opened revealing Tony. He looked over at me still wondering who was behind the helmet. I quickly got out of the suit finally revealing myself. A wide and relieved smile on my face when I saw him standing there with Steve. When he saw me he looked relieved and a small smile appeared on his face. I rushed over to him and gave him a hug. He wrapped his arms around me and his hand run down my hair as he kissed the top of my head.

“Oh god you’re here, you’re alive.” I heard him say quietly with a relieved sigh. I felt as happy tears now rolled down my cheeks. I tried to be gentle and not hug him that tight afraid to break his fragile state. “I lost him…. I lost peter.” He whispered his voice breaking. I closed my eyes at the sound of that and swallowed thickly. Seconds later feeling the embrace of Pepper as she came to hug tony. I was going to move to the side but she pulled me closer. Tony now had his arms wrapped around the both of us. This made me feel better made me feel complete. Having them both here with me.

Maybe theirs still hope to bring peter back. We just find the stones and we can maybe bring them all back. We have to have hope even if it is just a little. We need to bring him back all of them back.

.

.

.

.

I looked inside and their was a body inside and it seemed to be moving but in a non threatening way. I moved myself to be in front now so I could get a better view. “Time to go home.”

Steve rushed over to the ship and the door opened revealing Tony. He looked over at me still wondering who was behind the helmet. I quickly got out of the suit finally revealing myself. A wide and relieved smile on my face when I saw him standing there with Steve. When he saw me he looked relieved and a small smile appeared on his face. I rushed over to him and gave him a hug. He wrapped his arms around me and his hand run down my hair as he kissed the top of my head.

“Oh god you’re here, you’re alive.” I heard him say quietly with a relieved sigh. I felt as happy tears now rolled down my cheeks. I tried to be gentle and not hug him that tight afraid to break his fragile state. “I lost him…. I lost peter.” He whispered his voice breaking. I closed my eyes at the sound of that and swallowed thickly. Seconds later feeling the embrace of Pepper as she came to hug tony. I was going to move to the side but she pulled me closer. Tony now had his arms wrapped around the both of us. This made me feel better made me feel complete. Having them both here with me.

Maybe theirs still hope to bring peter back. We just find the stones and we can maybe bring them all back. We have to have hope even if it is just a little. We need to bring him back all of them back.

blog.name: twobitmulder
blog.title: Two-bit Mulder
blog.description: Anthropology Grad Student. Recent film school graduate.Lover of comic books, old movies, new movies, superheores, public domain literature, and any combination thereof.

body:
Victorian Literature as the MCU:

The Avengers

So, I don’t know how to link to a previous post but if you didn’t see my Dracula/Guardians of the Galaxy post, that explains the tenuous rationale behind this mad experiment.

Okay, some of these I have good reason for, some are kind of obvious, some I just think it would be fun to see these characters act out MCU scenes. Some of them aren’t strictly Victorian/Edwardian literature but I have reasons for them.

Tony Stark-Sherlock Holmes: not just because RDJ played them both, but because Holmes, like Stark, is this eccentric, addict, genius who deals with any problem he finds personally interesting whether it’s international intrigue or something more street level. He’s also a child of privilege.

Captain America-King Arthur: So, not strictly a Victorian character but an idealistic hero (in some versions) who went into suspended animation, waiting for when he’s needed again.

Thor-Horus: I swear the rest of these will be Characters from literature. Victorian Britain was obsessed with Ancient Egypt and in Egyptian Mythology Horus was the son of the sky god, brother (sometimes nephew, kind of like Thor and Loki in Mythology) to another god popularly thought of as evil but far more complex.

Black Widow-Sophie Kratides: The best Holmes character to never get any attention (except from Kim Newman). Sophie is a knife wielding Greek assassin seeking to balance a great wrong. Sound familiar?

Hawkeye-Daroga (The Persian): like Barton, the Persian from Phantom of the Opera is an old spy who took a chance on saving the life of someone he was meant to kill…it worked it better for Barton than Daroga.

Bruce Banner/The Hulk-Jekyll/Hyde: Kind of obvious I know, but it’s obvious for a reason. Jekyll and Banner both have dark sides that they try to distance themselves from but maybe should try to work with instead.

Rhodey-Watson: As Holmes’ military veteran best friend this feels obvious. Also, can you imagine Watson doing all the stuff Rhodey did. It’d be awesome.

Sam Wilson-John Roxton: Sometime I’ll have to make a post on how I prefer Doyle’s Challenger stories to Sherlock Holmes. Roxton is a morally upright adventurer, the kind of old chivalric soul who would join up with resurrected Arthur Pendragon and….well, I don’t want to spoil Endgame for anyone but if you’ve seen it you know where I’m going with this.

Scarlet Witch-Gerda (The Snow Queen): I know she doesn’t have any powers but I think this younger adventurer trying to save a sibling figure is a good analog for Wanda

Quicksilver-Kai (The Snow Queen): almost entirely based upon his relationship with Gerda….and his general bitterness….and his expendability.

Vision-Olympia the Doll Woman: Based on the idea of Frankenstein’s Monster as Ultron, Olympia would be the more perfect second draft, mixed with the consciousness of Mrs. Hudson (as JARVIS).

Doctor Strange-Doctor Silence: Victorian surgeon/mystic with a cool last name. Come on it writes itself.

Spider-Man-Mowgli: Orphaned, agile, heroic, raises by a single adoptive mother.

Scott Lang-Edward Malone: Again, if you haven’t, read the Professor Challenger stories. Malone is a capable man out of his depth dealing with an unpleasant genius and getting into a relationship with said genius’ daughter.

Hope Van Dyne-Enid Challenger: The capable businessminded (well journalist) daughter of scientist adventurers.

Hank Pym-George Challenger: See above. A prickly, egotistical scientist charting unknown worlds and at various times mourning his lost love.

Janet Pym-Jessica Challenger: Wife of egotistic genius who takes none of his guff.

Captain Marvel-Alice: I Now this seems like a stretch, but it’s partially the chronology (Alice really predates most of these guys) and the idea of a resourceful blonde trapped in an alien world.

So this was fun to do something with.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: I Love You 3000
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Ej6o0c

by softysstark

He pulled out a child-sized wooden chair just adjacent to the tent and sat in it, crossing his ankles.

“Morgan May Barnes, want some lunch?”

Suddenly, the opening of the tent was pulled aside and a small child came out, donning a red Iron Man helmet and gauntlet.

“Define lunch or be disintegrated,” the child said, threateningly pointing the gauntlet towards Tony’s face whilst struggling to keep the helmet on her head with the other.

Words: 1223, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: James “Bucky” Barnes, Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Morgan Stark (Marvel Cinematic Universe)
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Tony Stark, past Steve Rogers/Tony Stark - Relationship, Minor or Background Relationship(s)
  • Additional Tags: Avengers: Endgame (Movie) Spoilers, Canon Divergence - Avengers: Endgame (Movie), Non-Canon Relationship, Alpha/Beta/Omega Dynamics, Implied Mpreg, Alpha Bucky Barnes, Omega Tony Stark, Alpha Steve Rogers, Angst with a Happy Ending, Post-Civil War tensions, Protective Tony Stark, Tony Stark Needs a Hug, Tooth-Rotting Fluff, Jealous Steve Rogers, Bucky Barnes Feels, AU, Eventual Happy Ending, Other Ships Not Mentioned in Tags, Not Beta Read, Presumed Dead


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Ej6o0c

blog.name: cyberdelph
blog.title: Delph's World
blog.description:
I love reading...I like quotes and girly stuff...

Fan of the Cut & Run Serie & MM romance. 

Also a Black Dagger Brotherhood addict and a THIRDs nerds.

My favorite TV shows are : The Vampire Diaries, Teen Wolf, Buffy the vampire Slayer, Beauty & the Beast, Nikita, Bitten, Sherlock, Almost Human,Veronica Mars, The Following, Flash,iZombie,Supernatural, Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D, MCU...

Sometimes NSFW, so be warned...

Multifandom blog - Hate free blog. 
Multi shipper - Ship all the ships...No drama zone.

summary: Endgame has made me go from "ugh comics are too confusing and scary for me to try reading them" to "half of my shelves are now...

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: remember me when I'm gone
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2w65DTE

by merthurxmalec

“Pete… Peter,” Tony says, and Peter can’t bite back the sob that is escaping his mouth. “You are going to be better than all of us. You are going to do amazing things, kid, and I am so proud of you. So is your Tony, wherever he is. I can guarantee that. But I need you to promise me – promise him – that you are going to live. You are not going to let the grief overtake you. You are going to go out there, and you are going to be happy. I love you, kid.”

~

or alternatively: Peter gets a special message.

Words: 2249, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 3 of heart made of glass

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Categories: Gen, M/M
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Other Marvel Characters
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Steve Rogers
  • Additional Tags: Avengers: Endgame (Movie) Spoilers, Post-Canon, Post-Avengers: Endgame (Movie), this is pretty much just angst, With a sad ending, How Do I Tag, it’s just Peter being sad about the thing okay
